dcterms:creator: Byungju Kim
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: A variant of the MNIST dataset where digits are colored, with a strong correlation between color and digit class in the training set, while colors are assigned randomly in the test set.
dcterms:title: Coloured MNIST

dcterms:creator: Ziwei Liu
Y. Q. Wu
X. Tang
X. Wang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing over 200,000 celebrity images annotated with various binary attributes, used to study the effects of sensitive attributes on model fairness.
dcterms:title: CelebA

dcterms:creator: Thomas Kehrenberg
Zexun Chen
Novi Quadrianto
dcterms:description: A dataset from the UCI repository containing census data, commonly used to evaluate models focused on algorithmic fairness, particularly in predicting income levels.
dcterms:title: Adult
